con:restRequest.name: Create Plan
con:restRequest.con:request: { "idUserCreator": 1, "id": null, "startDate": null, "creationDate": null, "parentWorkItem": "${#TestCase#parentWorkItem}", "description": null, "currentState": null, "name": "Plan Name Swagger", "waitForCompletion": false, "dueDate": null, "contextualized": true }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.*
def response = context.expand( '${get Plan created#Response}' ).toString() def jsonResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response)
jsonResponse.description = 'Plan Edited' jsonResponse.name = 'Plan Name Swagger Edited' jsonResponse.waitForCompletion = true jsonResponse.dueDate = 1584025505010
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("planEdited", new JsonBuilder(jsonResponse).toString())

con:restRequest.name: Edit plan
con:restRequest.con:request: ${#TestCase#planEdited}

con:config.script: def templateName = String.format("Template Swagger %s", UUID.randomUUID().toString()) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("templateName", templateName)
